name: mountain
content:
mountain noun [C]
(VERY LARGE HILL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 a raised part of the earth's surface, much larger than a hill, the top of which might be covered in snow: The Matterhorn is one of the biggest mountains in Europe. The Rockies are a mountain chain/range in the western United States. I'd love to go mountain-climbing. We're going to the mountains (= an area where there are mountains) for our holiday.
zorazhuang/E+/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesWe camped on one of the lower slopes of the mountain.The view from the top of the mountain is breathtaking.What's the highest mountain in Europe?After three days lost in the mountains, all the climbers arrived home safe and sound.They slowly ascended the steep path up the mountain.
